description: Try our easy to follow Star Cookie Christmas Tree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Cookie,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Star Cookie Christmas Tree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with paper.
Sift flour, icing sugar and rice flour together into a large bowl. Add butter and rub into flour, using fingertips, until well combined. Press mixture together to form a dough.

Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead gently until smooth. Roll dough out with a rolling pin until 4mm thick and place in fridge to chill. Cut out star shapes from dough using star cutters.
Place on trays and bake for 15 minutes until pale golden. Cool for 5 minutes on the trays before moving to a wire rack to cool completely. See right for decorating.
